CustomMessages.afterPickingTheOrder: After picking the order, place boxed or bagged items in the In Store Pick Up hold area; label larger items with a copy of the pick sheet.
CustomMessages.orderContinueInstructions: Click continue and follow the instructions to prepare the order for customer pickup. When the customer is in the store to pick up the order, return to complete the Provide to Customer step.
CustomMessages.readyForPickup: By selecting READY FOR PICKUP, you will be generating a notification to the customer that their shipment is ready to be picked up. Please ensure your location has operational capacity to deliver the shipment as well.
CustomMessages.partialOrderReadyForPickup: By selecting PARTIAL SHIPMENT READY FOR PICKUP, you will be generating a notification to the customer that their shipment cannot be fulfilled in full and is ready to be picked up. Please ensure your location has operational capacity to deliver the shipment as well.
CustomMessages.itemUnavailableCancelShipment: By selecting ITEM UNAVAILABLE CANCEL SHIPMENT, you will be generating a notification to the customer that their shipment has been canceled.
CustomMessages.cancelShipmentNotification: By selecting this you are confirming the customer wishes to cancel the order. Selecting this will notify the customer the order has been canceled and they should notify customer service with any questions
CustomMessages.acceptShipmentNotification: By selecting this you have verified the customer has received the entire order. Selecting this will notify the customer the order process has been completed and there are no more actions required
